qualifier:
Unprotected write. Non-private method `com.moilioncircle.redis.replicator.RedisSocketReplicator.open` indirectly writes to field `this.com.moilioncircle.redis.replicator.RedisSocketReplicator.replyParser.com.moilioncircle.redis.replicator.cmd.ReplyParser.in.com.moilioncircle.redis.replicator.io.RedisInputStream.markLen` outside of synchronization.
 Reporting because this access may occur on a background thread.

Note that the prefix path this.com.moilioncircle.redis.replicator.RedisSocketReplicator.replyParser has been contaminated during the execution, so the reported race on this.com.moilioncircle.redis.replicator.RedisSocketReplicator.replyParser.com.moilioncircle.redis.replicator.cmd.ReplyParser.in.com.moilioncircle.redis.replicator.io.RedisInputStream.markLen might be a false positive.
